Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Checks

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Checks
public class Checks
extends java.lang.Object
This class describes the validity conditions of the chosen coordinate and it is used by the main actions of the game: move and build. Has the following methods

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Checks​(Model model, Coordinate coordinate)
    overloading Checks construction to made up the valid coordinates in the tile as an array.
    Checks​(Model model, Coordinate from, Coordinate destination)
    in this construction result is made up from the potential destination points as an Array list which contains the number of false boolean object that equals to the array size

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Checks add​(Coordinate additionalValidCoordinate)
    Method is used in some classes in order to implement some God's power, to add the valid Coordinate to the standard valid coordinates
    java.util.List<Coordinate> getResult()
    Getter method to access the result array, verifies the destinations with accessible set of destinations, in case if one of the players possess the Athena's power and the destination can not be reachable according to GroundEffect rule, this destination is removed from the array
    Checks isNotBuild​(int height)  
    Checks isNotDome()
    method verifies each coordinate in the destinations array whether it is a dome or not, positive results are filled with false element in the corresponding indexes
    Checks isNotWorker()
    Method verifies that in the possible destinations there are no worker, otherwise false is set into corresponding index of result array
    Checks isRisible()
    method isRisible() is overloaded for the default case, i.e according to the game rules, without using any power, it is possible to move up to 1 level;
    Checks isRisible​(int MaxPositiveHeight)
    method calculates the level difference between destination and from coordinates, if the difference is more that maximum possible height, in the array of result false is set in corresponding index
    Checks remove​(Coordinate alwaysFalseCoordinate)
    method deletes the coordinate that is never reachable from the corresponding index of the destination array
    boolean simpleGetResult()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Checks

      public Checks​(Model model, Coordinate from, Coordinate destination)
      in this construction result is made up from the potential destination points as an Array list which contains the number of false boolean object that equals to the array size
      Parameters:
      model - of type Model
      from - Coordinate
      destination - of type Coordinate

    • Checks

      public Checks​(Model model, Coordinate coordinate)
      overloading Checks construction to made up the valid coordinates in the tile as an array. It's instances are true boolean objects.
      Parameters:
      model - current model
      coordinate - current coordinate

  • Method Details

    • isRisible

      public Checks isRisible​(int MaxPositiveHeight)
      method calculates the level difference between destination and from coordinates, if the difference is more that maximum possible height, in the array of result false is set in corresponding index
      Parameters:
      MaxPositiveHeight - integer value
      Returns:
      current object instance

    • isRisible

      public Checks isRisible()
      method isRisible() is overloaded for the default case, i.e according to the game rules, without using any power, it is possible to move up to 1 level;
      Returns:
      isRisible(1)

    • isNotDome

      public Checks isNotDome()
      method verifies each coordinate in the destinations array whether it is a dome or not, positive results are filled with false element in the corresponding indexes
      Returns:
      current object instance

    • isNotBuild

      public Checks isNotBuild​(int height)

    • isNotWorker

      public Checks isNotWorker()
      Method verifies that in the possible destinations there are no worker, otherwise false is set into corresponding index of result array
      Returns:
      current object instance

    • remove

      public Checks remove​(Coordinate alwaysFalseCoordinate)
      method deletes the coordinate that is never reachable from the corresponding index of the destination array
      Parameters:
      alwaysFalseCoordinate - i.e the coordinate that is impossible to reach
      Returns:
      current object instance

    • add

      public Checks add​(Coordinate additionalValidCoordinate)
      Method is used in some classes in order to implement some God's power, to add the valid Coordinate to the standard valid coordinates
      Parameters:
      additionalValidCoordinate - of type Coordinate
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getResult

      public java.util.List<Coordinate> getResult()
      Getter method to access the result array, verifies the destinations with accessible set of destinations, in case if one of the players possess the Athena's power and the destination can not be reachable according to GroundEffect rule, this destination is removed from the array
      Returns:
      the array containing the accessible destination

    • simpleGetResult

      public boolean simpleGetResult()
